C

canAfford(int) - Method in interface Trader
If amount is negative, an IllegalArgumentException must be thrown; returns true if the object has enough money, false otherwise
canAfford(int) - Method in class Wizard
Return true, if money is greater than or equal to amount, false otherwise
canLoot() - Method in interface Trader
Returns true if the object is capable to loot; default implementation always returns false.
canLoot() - Method in class Wizard
Returns true if this object's HP are not 0 (alive wizard)
canSteal() - Method in interface Trader
Returns true if the object is capable to steal; default implementation always returns false this will be overridden for the class Wizard, so that only living Wizards can steal.
canSteal() - Method in class Wizard
Returns true, if this object's HP are not 0 (alive wizard).
carryingCapacity - Variable in class Wizard
Not negative
cast(MagicSource, MagicEffectRealization) - Method in class Spell
Ensure necessary magic level and get necessary energy by calling provideMana on source (this will typically reduce MP in source).
castRandomSpell(MagicEffectRealization) - Method in class Wizard
If this object's knownSpells is empty, return false otherwise choose a random spell from knownSpells and delegate to castSpell(Spell, MagicEffectRealization)
castSpell(Spell, MagicEffectRealization) - Method in class Wizard
If s or target is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned; if wizard does not know the spell, false is returned; call cast on s with this as source and parameter target as target return true, if cast was called;
Concoction - Class in a12345678.change.to.your.matriculation.number
Concoctions can affect health and mana of the target at the same time and additionally cast any number of spells
